abstract: It appears that the iPhone is no longer available for purchase on AT&T’s Web site for customers with ZIP codes in the New York City area.
snippet: It appears that the iPhone is no longer available for purchase on AT&T’s Web site for customers with ZIP codes in the New York City area.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:25 p.m.  Adding at the end that online sales to New Yorkers have resumed.

headline.main: For New Yorkers, Trouble Buying an iPhone on AT&T’s Site
